title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Prerequisite: NoneDigital computer fundamentals: basic building blocks, program execution, instruction sets and addressing modes, memory organization, I/O, interrupts. Number representation. Basics of system software. Abstract data types â stack, queue, list, tree, graph. Binary search trees and Heap. Basic concepts of algorithms, complexity analysis. Searching and Sorting. Graph algorithms. Basics of System Software.
